short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Contact Finder âš¡ - Automate & personalise your outbound campaigns with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Contact Finder âš¡, prospecting and reaching out to potential customers or hires has never been easier! Our AI-powered platform simplifies the outbound outreach process and helps you find and connect with top leads or talent effortlessly.

Gone are the days of using multiple tools to find candidate email addresses, send LinkedIn InMails, and manage email sequences. With Outreach Copilot, you can do it all with just one click!

No need to worry about domains and warming them as well. We take care of everything. 

Our platform allows you to personalize all of your messages with the power of AI from GPT4. Plus, you can manage everything in real-time through a tracker, creating a mini ATS that streamlines your entire process.

We understand the challenges of outbound campaigns and have conducted extensive research to address them. We know that outbound sourcing is critical, but response rates to LinkedIn messages are often low. That's why we've created Outreach Copilot - to help you easily reach out to potential leads and increase your response rate.

Stop struggling with a bad recruiting/sales pipeline and let Outreach Copilot be your co-pilot in finding top leads.
